title: Marion Zimmer Bradley's Fantasy Magazine v1#2 1988-Autumn
description:
Marion Zimmer Bradley's Fantasy Magazine Vol. 1 No. 2, Autumn 1988.

This magazine is a fantasy and science fiction anthology (ISSN 0897-9286) edited by Marion Zimmer Bradley and Jan Burke which I have reproduced here as an OCR'd PDF. Contents:

Armstrong-Jones, Lynne: The Lady, The Wizard and The Thing
Betancourt, John Gregory: Dreamtime in Adjaphon
Carr, Jayge: Hitchhiker
Fisher, Stephen C.: Mary Rose and the Devil
Heydt, Dorothy J.: Paradox Lost
O'Brien, Terry: Mistaking the Dragon Mage
Shwartz, Susan: The Bone Serai
Zimmer, Paul Edwin: The Vision of Aldamir
